name: getgroups
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maytapi_whatsapp.
Tool description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
API description: Fetches the WhatsApp groups associated with the provided phone ID using the Maytapi API.

phone_id.description: The ID of the phone whose WhatsApp groups are to be fetched.
